name: GRAVITAZE 1
description:
GRAVITAZE is a game that mixes gavity and maze. Your goal is to reach the center of the maze. But for that you need to use the gravity shift and the maze itself to get to the center.

CONTROLS

PC

  • KEYBOARD
      Esc ----- Pause Menu
      Space ----- Change Gravity
  • MOUSE
      Left Key ----- Change Gravity
  • GAMEPAD
      Start ----- Pause Menu
      A ------ Change Gravity

SMARTPHONE

  • TOUCH
      Touch On Screen ------ Change Gravity
  • GAMEPAD
      Start ----- Pause Menu
      A ------ Change Gravity
HOW TO PLAY?

when you touch the screen wait a few seconds and the circle will start moving towards the top
